hero.title: Service design
hero.text: Optimize your team’s efforts to deliver a consistent, connected customer experience that drives engagement and retention.

solutions.title: Service design answers important operational questions
questions: How do we deliver service more effectively by increasing online adoption?
Are we making the best technology choices for our organization?
How do we improve collaboration across our organization in order to improve service delivery?
How can we improve omni-channel customer experience

description.title: Connected experiences, delivered
description.text:
The essence of service design is to create new services–or transform existing ones-that more closely align market needs with organizational objectives and capabilities.

 Most traditional service design shops urge their clients to primarily affect cultural or organizational change. 

 **Our team focuses on a more pragmatic approach. It’s digital-centric and yields impressive results for our clients.**

 We offer you service and related product recommendations that are immediately actionable, delivering improvements across key metrics such as customer growth, engagement, retention, satisfaction, revenue, team efficiency, and more.

items.title: Discovery
items.text: Using a variety of information gathering and research methods, we identify and map the holistic experience of your services, and how customers, staff and other players move through your service’s touchpoints.

items.title: Analysis
items.text: We do a deep-dive into identifying organizational gaps, market opportunities, and process improvements, with tactics including customer journey mapping, service blueprinting, and more.

items.title: Optimization and implementation
items.text: Our analysis and synthesis of findings will set the blueprint that guides your team in making strategic improvements to your services. You’ll have the tools you need to align internal teams and stakeholders, deliver services more efficiently, and apply the added lens of digital strategy consulting to uncover new automation, data, and digital product opportunities.

items.title: Continuous improvement
items.text: Our team will coach you through foundational objectives and key results (OKRs) and key performance indicators (KPIs), related data tracking, user testing, analysis, and methodologies to make your service delivery stronger on an ongoing basis.

items.title: Organizational maturity assessment
items.text:
Our needs identification & readiness assessments considers the full complexity of achieving organizational and digital excellence towards improved operations, customer experience, and technology decision-making. 

 Use this service to plot the roadmap to achieving digital excellence across your organization.

items.title: System strategy
items.text: System strategy helps accelerate internal decision-making with an approach that uncovers key opportunities to drive customer engagement and retention while optimizing operations. We achieve this by mapping internal capabilities and consumer objectives in order to define an effective roadmap that meets organizational and market needs.

items.title: Inclusive design
items.text: Inclusive design ensures your products and services are embraced by your market by welcoming diverse market segments to engage authentically with your organization. Learn how to design with intersectionality, usability, accessibility, and inclusion at the centre of your work.

items.title: Achieving digital excellence
items.text: From communications to product to organizational efficiency, operating online involves significant depth of expertise. With digital channels and consumer touchpoints extending beyond online to in-person and at home, success in the connected age requires a breadth of expertise that defines your organization’s digital maturity and capabilities.

callToAction: Discover how assessing and refocusing your organization can lead to improved operations, customer experience, and technology decision-making.
